data.title: AB 1894 and new requirements for packaging, labeling, advertising, and marketing
data.excerpt: In 2022, the California Legislature passed Assembly Bill 1894, the “Integrated cannabis vaporizer: packaging, labeling, advertisement, and marketing” bill. Beginning July 1, 2024, this bill will add new requirements for the packaging, labeling, advertising, or marketing of cannabis cartridges and integrated cannabis vaporizers.Â  Summary of the requirements There are two parts to the new requirements: […]
